attributes.action: Not change the constitution to allow Roman Catholics the right to be heirs to the throne.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This country has been made great on the Protestent principles which give us the freedom not to be dominated by the Roman Catholic Church. This church wished to impose its will on all people and has never changed it's mind on this. Our monarch is the head of the Protestant Church of England and should remain so. Think what the word protestant means, if you don't know read your history.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
